abstract: Motorola has plans clear most of its debt then channel the remaining funds of between $3 billion and $4 billion into a new business focused on its cellphone unit, which is currently losing money, The Wall Street Journal reports.
snippet: Motorola has plans clear most of its debt then channel the remaining funds of between $3 billion and $4 billion into a new business focused on its cellphone unit, which is currently losing money, The Wall Street Journal reports.

headline.main: Motorola Expected to Split and Focus on Cellphones
